item.title: Jump in to ride all the Bangalore taxis, at once
item.description: All right, just imagine that you have popcorn with you, because I know that you don’t have. I decided to do this report when I was in Bangalore this summer, Sillicon Valley of India. You can observe a gob of information flowing through in such metropolitan population. People ordering/delivering meal, groceries or literally everything by online orders, people booking a vehicle and riding in no time, people booking a seat for dinner/movie and many more thing to generate the logs.
